Package com.ibm.streams.operator.control.patterns

Class NotificationTupleSubmitter

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.streams.operator.control.patterns.NotificationTupleSubmitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, NotificationListener
public class NotificationTupleSubmitter extends Object implements NotificationListener
Notification listener that submits a tuple to an output port with the attributes set from the Notification. This provides a mechanism to convert notifications from the Job Control Plane (or any JMX MBean) to tuples for stream processing.

The tuple is sent asynchronously so that any tuple processing does not block notification handling. This also means that tuples may be submitted in a different order to their notification order.

The tuple may have any number of attributes, and attributes not set from the notification are set to their default value.
If attribute matches one of these, then it is set from the Notification:

  • rstring source - The value of ObjectName.getCanonicalName() for the value returned by getSource().
  • rstring notifyType - The value of getType().
  • int64 sequence - The value of getSequenceNumber().
  • timestamp ts - The value of getTimeStamp() with machine identifier set to Timestamp.DEFAULT_MACHINE.
  • rstring message - The value of getMessage(), if it is not null.
  • rstring userDataString - The value of getUserData().toString(), if getUserData() is not null.
  • userData - The value of getUserData(), note the SPL type of userData attribute must be directly assignable from the object type returned by getUserData().
  • handback - The value of handback set when this was added as a notification handler, note the SPL type of handback attribute must be directly assignable from the object type of handback.
rstring values are assigned from String objects using UTF-8 encoding.

    static final StreamSchema
    BASE_NOTIFY_SCHEMA
    Base schema that includes all the fixed typed attributes that can be set from a Notification, namely source, notifyType, sequence, ts and message.
